content:
Examples of Classes

Examples of Classes

  • Class Name: Bank Account
    • Class Structure (Attributes)
      • Acct Number, Bank Name, Owner Name, Acct Balance
    • Class Behavior (Operations)
      • Withdraw, Deposit, Generate Statement
    • Class Name: Employee
      • Class Structure (Attributes)
        • Employee Name, Address, Position, Salary, Start Date
      • Class Behavior (Operations)
        • Hire, Fire, Promote, Increase Salary, Retire
      • Computer, Car, Person, Media Player, Counter, Program
